description: This file defines a Qwik component named NoteList, which renders a list of note items for a note-taking application. It includes styling, type definitions for note items and props, and the component logic for displaying, selecting, and deleting notes within the sidebar interface.

methods.name: NoteList
methods.description: A Qwik component that displays a list of notes with titles and snippets, highlighting the selected note and providing delete functionality.
